Author: friedryebread
Text: I lost 65 pounds after high school when I was addicted to Adderall and self harmed duribg college. I eat kicked out of the community college I was attending and while I tried to put my mental healthy forst I fucking gained 117 pounds. Yeah. It was about 30 pounds a year. Now I'm back in college and the stress has brought the control part back in and it's the same sgut different year.   But looking at me you'd never know I weighed like a total of 170 pounds less than what I am now. It sucks....I would rant about it but I think you all xan relate.

Author: Aleph0-4
Text: I felt the same when I was diagnosed with AN/BP instead of bulimia. back then, despite being a bit underweight, I felt mocked. like they've put me next to a row of anorexics who were actually underweight and i'm the fat one who sucks at having an ED.
